TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICommandExecutor

Docs.summary: Defines a method that executes a certain action on the type that implements this interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The method in this interface is not called on classes that exist outside the .NET Framework.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Execute() cil managed

Docs.summary: Performs a task that is determined by the type that implements this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICommandExecutor.Execute%2A> method is not called on classes that exist outside the .NET Framework.
